name: Die Dungeon, Die
description:
Survive the dungeon.
Gather enough keys to open the final door and escape but you must fend off enemies and traps along the way.
A quick but challenging experience.

Time ran out so here's the tutorial:

  • You need 10 keeys to get to the exit door.
  • Each time you explore the dungeon you will find a challenge, monster rooms have an Armor challenge, to not receive damage, and a Prowess challenge to get an extra bonus (the bonus is ussually dice that are added to the pool or a key and they are shown in the room preview), traps only have a Prowess challenge but may make you lose keys
  • During a challenge you may only use dice of the same type for each stat (Keys, Prowess and Armor)
  • When you get the 10 keys you will face a boss, to beat the boss you need to accumulate enough prowess while resisting his attacks. Prowess stacks through the turns. You may toss some dice back into the bag if you can't use them in this fight

That's it! Hope you enjoy it!
